```py
scipy.optimize.fixed_point(func, x0, args=(), xtol=1e-08, maxiter=500, method='del2')
```

```py
>>> import numpy as np
>>> from scipy import optimize
>>> def func(x, c1, c2):
...    return np.sqrt(c1/(x+c2))
>>> c1 = np.array([10,12.])
>>> c2 = np.array([3, 5.])
>>> optimize.fixed_point(func, [1.2, 1.3], args=(c1,c2))
array([ 1.4920333 ,  1.37228132]) 
```
